title: For Fallon
description: We all have a façade, a concealed mask we wear to portray ourselves to the world. Fallon’s mask is real, what you see is what you get. Growing up with two loving parents in Chicago, graduating in Chicago, and now working a job she loves, she enjoys her life. Her untarnished world is shaken when Luca crosses her path. Luca’s mask is tightly controlled. Distrust, rivalry, and violence rule his life.When confronted with insecurities, when the one you love wears his mask perfectly, when your life unravels and you don’t know why, do you keep trusting the person you love? Everyone has a façade. Everyone has an ulterior motive.A Contemporary Romance/ Romantic Suspense in dual point of view.*Contains violence and sex not suitable for minors.
author: Soraya Naomi
